synopsis.text: Work of a 2012 graduate from Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media, Senri IIDA, presents a heartwarming tale set in an amusement park one sunny afternoon. A high school girl unintentionally leaves behind her beloved bear key-holder while exchanging it for another. The bear, under the impression of being forsaken, embarks on a mission to find her. Will the bear succeed in reclaiming her affection? This poignant narrative explores themes of love, loss, and the pursuit of reunion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
